title: Toxic
description: My life has been a series of bad decisions.Marrying an abusive man was the first... but falling for a dangerous inmate where I’m a nurse may be the worst.He’s brutal, heartless, and twisted.But he’s also the only one to notice the bruises on my skin.His forbidden touch becomes my addiction.His drugging kisses my obsession.After I learn the truth about why he’s in prison, I try to escape, but but he finds me.Now I'm his prisoner.
author: Nicole Blanchard
